name: Accendo
description:
Our product was created in response to the challenge of aligning talent with business strategy. Constant disruption is the new normal, while prioritising the talent agenda to drive organisational performance. HRMS solutions mainly served as record-keeping systems, and business leaders lacked practical tools for agile talent management. Employees were often excluded from decisions. We want our product to address these issues.
As such, we aim to align business and talent by considering the needs of both the organisation and the individual.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Helping Leading Companies Build Organisational Agility And Resilience
ShortDescription: We exist because companies struggle to align talent with business strategy and need a completely new approach to managing talent.

Highlights.name: Talent Acquisition & Management Made Easy
Highlights.description: TalentPulse simplifies the process of finding, acquiring, and managing top talent by integrating with your HR systems and providing a  shop for talent assessment tools

Highlights.name: Data-Driven Talent Decisions
Highlights.description: TalentPulse empowers you to make informed choices about your workforce by leveraging assessments with your core HRIS solutions to gain insights into your employees' strengths and development opportunities.

Highlights.name: Build Your Dream Team
Highlights.description: TalentPulse offers a curated marketplace of validated talent assessment tools, allowing you to build a high-performing team by identifying the best candidates globally.

enhanced_description: Accendo is an HR technology product designed to address the critical challenge of aligning talent with business strategy in an era of constant disruption. Moving beyond traditional HRMS solutions that primarily served as record-keeping systems, Accendo provides practical tools for agile talent management, ensuring that both organizational and individual needs are considered. The platform aims to help leading companies build organizational agility and resilience by simplifying the end-to-end process of finding, acquiring, and managing top talent. It achieves this by integrating with existing HR systems and core HRIS solutions, and by leveraging data-driven talent assessment tools to empower informed workforce decisions, gain insights into employee strengths and development opportunities, and ultimately build high-performing teams.
